arts.ttl: Leeds United: Junior Firpo contract latest, bosman transfer possible
arts.sum: Leeds United left-back Junior Firpo proved to be one of Daniel Farke’s most important players in 2024, but his future is up in the air in the new year. Firpo himself isn’t looking to jump into any decision at the moment, be that a new contract extension at Leeds are an agreement to leave in the summer.

arts.ttl: Ethan Ampadu fires Leeds United promotion message as clear position change point made
arts.sum: Ethan Ampadu has admitted that picking up the three points was the "main thing" after Leeds United defeated Sheffield Wednesday 3-0 on Sunday. "I said for a long time that I'm happy to help the team any way I can, whether that's as a defender like today, then so be it.

arts.ttl: Jurgen Klopp’s Red Bull: Everything he said as Leeds watch on
arts.sum: Would Klopp ever manage Leeds or other Red Bull clubs? It’s a development worth Leeds keeping an eye on, knowing that the German could be overseeing strategic work done by Red Bull that might end up impacting the Whites down the line, should the energy drinks giant become more of an active participant in happenings in LS11.

arts.ttl: Leeds sink Sheffield Wednesday to return to Championship summit
arts.sum: When the dust settles on this most compelling of Championship seasons, these may well turn out to be the days and the moments which could make all the difference for Leeds. You can feel the trepidation and tension every time you set foot inside Elland Road, given how the Whites compiled 90 points last year and still failed to secure promotion to the Premier League. The desperation to avoid something similar again this season is almost palpable and every time there is even the briefest of missteps, it is not difficult for Leeds supporters to fear the worst. Leeds enjoyed a comfortable 3-0 home win against Yorkshire rivals Sheffield Wednesday on Sunday as they held onto the top spot for another gameweek. The Whites have won 10 and drawn one of their last ...

arts.ttl: Daniel Farke offers Largie Ramazani verdict and provides injury update on Leeds United duo
arts.sum: Daniel Farke praised Largie Ramazani's impact in Leeds United's home win over Sheffield Wednesday. The winger stepped up off the bench to contribute an assist and a goal as the Whites moved back to the top of the Championship.

arts.ttl: Danny Röhl pinpoints key difference that gave Leeds United the edge vs Sheffield Wednesday
arts.sum: Sheffield Wednesday head coach Danny Röhl said Leeds United's strength in depth swung things their way in the Yorkshire derby at Elland Road. Get Leeds United news to your phone with our WhatsApp community

arts.ttl: Back on top! Leeds hit three past Wednesday in Yorkshire derby
arts.sum: Highlights of the Sky Bet Championship match between Leeds and Sheffield Wednesday.

arts.ttl: Leeds United player ratings as midfield duo impress in Sheffield Wednesday win
arts.sum: Manor Solomon's early strike - his fourth goal of the season - put the hosts ahead before Largie Ramazani made sure of the points late on. For Ramazani, it was his second goal in as many matches, while Tanaka's backheel was his second in two league games.

arts.ttl: Leeds back on top of the Championship after beating Sheffield Wednesday
arts.sum: Goals from Manor Solomon, Largie Ramazani and Ao Tanaka earned the Whites victory.
